Message.Name: surgery.lack-of-nurses.scars
Message.Text: Due to a lack of care by the nurses, ${name}'s wounds have become infected. This surgery will leave Scars.

Message.Name: surgery.lack-of-nurses.health
Message.Text: You seem to have too few nurses that provide care for your patients after their operation. This has negative effects on ${name}'s health.

Message.Name: too-sick.quality-nurses
Message.Text: ${name}'s health condition does not allow surgery to be performed. Your highly qualified nursing staff are making sure she gets well enough for her treatment soon.

Message.Name: too-sick.basic-nurses
Message.Text: Your caretakers are trying to nurse ${name} back to health so that the doctor can perform the surgery.

Message.Name: too-sick.no-nurses
Message.Text: ${name}'s health condition does not allow surgery to be performed, and with no nurses around it may take a long time for her to get better. All she can do is rest.

Message.Name: recovery.great
Message.Text: Your professional nurses ensure a speedy recovery.

Message.Name: recovery.complications
Message.Text: These complications will prolong her stay in the hospital.
